actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to make the use of a firearm to commit certain felonies a Federal crime where that use violates State law.

summary.text: Applies penalties for using or unlawfully carrying a firearm during the commission of a Federal felony to unlawful use or carrying of an explosive or other destructive device and to unlawful use or carrying of a firearm or destructive device during the commission of a State felony.

titles.title: A bill to make the use of a firearm to commit certain felonies a Federal crime where that use violates State law.
